Stuff I Use

Collection of hardware and software I use to get my work done. Some are excellent and worthy of recommendation for anyone looking for tools for that specific purpose.

Software

  • Sketch (creating/editing SVGs)
  • Telegram (company-wide chat and file-sharing platform at Octal)
  • 1Password (for generating and saving passwords across platforms)
  • Atom (my code-editor of choice)
  • Transmit / Forklift (my FTP/SSH clients of choice)
  • Todoist (my to-do manager of choice)
  • SourceTree (my git client of choice)
  • Day One (for keeping a personal journal)
  • Authy (for generating 2FA codes)

Cloud services

  • Bitbucket (for hosting private code) & GitHub (for hosting public code)
  • Evernote (for managing documents, travel itineraries and PDFs)
  • Pinboard (for saving/tagging links & bookmarks)
  • LiveNote (our own app, for text-based live-syncing collaboration)
  • Hover (my domain registrar of choice, and the best one out there)
  • Digital Ocean (Linux SSD servers for all our sites)
  • Time Machine (keeping local backup of all my files)

Misc

  • Victorinox Swisstool Spirit X
  • Canon EOS 550D + lenses
  • Mi 10400mAh Power Bank
  • Jawbone UP24 Fitness Tracker
  • Sennheiser MM 80 I Earphones
